entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -23.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
